name: @rollup/plugin-run
description: Run your bundle after you've built it
author: Rich Harris

scripts.ci:coverage: nyc pnpm run test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov
scripts.ci:lint: pnpm run build && pnpm run lint && pnpm run security
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:js && pnpm run lint:docs && pnpm run lint:package
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test
